Articles.Content:
After going to all the planets in Kerbol but Jool or Eeloo I embark on a one hour trip to Eeloo onboard was Lueny Kerman, Dunming Kerman, and Tombus Kerman. They are currently doing research.... Erm or should be doing research while staying in a stable orbit of 5600 Km. We plan to land it on Laythe since it has a Kerbin like atmosphere..... [End Transmisssion]![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2kNNEeLax5c?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-07T17:21:31Z" title="03/07/2015 05:21  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 7, 2015</time> by ghostbuzzer7**

Hmm.... that orbit is suspicious.

Oh. That's not stock, is it? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Those parts are odd.

I used the Ion Hybrid Electric Pack

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/31286-0-22-Ion-Hybrid-Electric-Pack-30-08-13-Soon-FKSP!!!-See-Development-Monitor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/31286-0-22-Ion-Hybrid-Electric-Pack-30-08-13-Soon-FKSP!!!-See-Development-Monitor)

and ZG-27 fuel synthesizers in which I didnt use only when I got into orbit of Jool. Other than that pretty stock.

[http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/224606-zg-27-fuel-synthesizers-1-2-1](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/224606-zg-27-fuel-synthesizers-1-2-1)

I used the sun's periapsis to get me there after passing minimus it slingshot me directly into Jool's gravitational pull. I got luck ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
This thread has been shift over to the subforum for player-made videos.
